name: Machine.Earth
slogan: We build software that connects humans, tech, and environments
description: Machine Earth builds cutting edge software platforms for Creative Agencies servicing the Events industry,

team.name: Anthony Frisby
team.bioHtml: CTO & Co-Founder at Machine.Earth. Responsible for enabling awesome people to do awesome things—internal platforms—project technical architecture.

team.name: Shehleeza Khan
team.bioHtml: Cofounder and COO. Responsible for day-to-day operations and managing all customer and strategic relationships to support company growth.

jobs.title: Creative Technologist/ Digital Project Manager
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Creative Technologist to join our team. By taking the lead on a wide array of digital projects you will work very closely with our clients all the way from pitch to planning to deployment. 

Key Responsibilities 
-Act as a conduit between our clients and our development teams 
-Manage our development teams during the various phases of the project (scoping, design, development and deployment)
-Understand timelines, feasibility and costs and proactively propose alternative solutions 
-Stay abreast of the latest technologies and identify ways to utilise them 

We’d like to see 
-Ability to provide solutions that deliver on our clients’ business goals and needs 
-Solid experience in managing digital projects and development teams
Ability to present complex ideas in a simple, engaging, and effective way to techie and non-techie types 
-Proven ability to lead, organise and execute with little or no direction, deliver commitments on time and within budget, and to work in a team within a fast pace environment 
-A vast knowledge of various technologies and how people interact with them. Technologies we’ve worked with include: AR, VR, touchscreen applications, RFiD, NFC and IR

jobs.title: Full Stack JavaScript (NodeJS) Developer
jobs.description: Machine.Earth are building a number of systems and hardware platforms, from login systems, all the way through to drones. Chat to us and we can tell you more!
